message.body: Hi Jeremy,it's Dorota from Poland.Just wanted to make sure that everything is fine and we see each other tomorrow in Philadelphia?i arrive to the city at
7.50a.m. Would you be at home then?greetings,Dorota (this is my u.s. cell)
Hello, Dorota. Oh yes, we will definitely be at home (sleeping) tomorrow morning. Just call/text when you arrive
Sure!see you tomorrow!
Hi,I'm in front of your home,but I'm not sure which bell should I push?
I've just lost you somewhere:), so I go home,ok?see you there and enjoy your evening!:)
Are you headed home?
Yes!
Ok, thanks for coming!! When do you plan to leave?
I've got the bus to washington tomorrow at 5.30 p.m, so not sure how to solve it?would you be at home there or I should leave your place in the morning?
Oh,btw: do you maybe have wi-fi at your place?And if yes-could you please send me the password as i need to contact my washington host?
Yup yup!!
Thx!!
Yup! Let me know if you have any problems
And,yes you can leave yr stuff at our place during the day
Great!thx!
Enjoy the rest of your trip, Dorota! Hope to rendezvous in Warsaw soon.
And to get a better picture of the infamous hot pockets : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N-i9GXbptog
:))) thank you!! It was great surfing with you and Kennedy!feel invited to Poland anytime!hugs!
And tell your NYC friends that we will be performing our drag act on July 15th in Brooklyn!
I will! Just let me know where exactly in nyc!
A club called 'goodbye, blue monday'. (I'll be doing a promo blast in a few days on facebook)
Cool!
I've just reached my Washington host.Once again thank you and Kennedy for your hospitality,kindness and being awesome:)
Your Polish is perfect!;)
